name: Retro Mountain
description:
In this game, you play a young university graduate who's taken a job as a care taker of an old fallout shelter that was last renovated in the Nixon administration. You aren't supposed to go in there... but who's going to know if you do?

This is an interactive portfolio I created, that I hope to someday turn into a fully fledged game. If you try it out please leave a comment and let me know what you though. Also, any donations would be greatly appreciated.
